TextView.android:text: Customer Pest Infor..
Copy of Signed OCC- Order cum Contract Form
PO-Customer Purchase Order / Service Agreement / Work Order
Emergency Contact No - Escalation Matrix
Technician Police Verification,Health & ID Records
Technician Training Certificate including IPM & GMP
Rentokil PCI serving branch Licence copy- Form- VIII
Rentokil PCI Holiday list with Optional Holiday
Annual Service Calendar
List of Approved Preparations (APL) with Dilution ratio(Service wise Pesticide Chart)
List of Antidote
Label copies of Approved Preparations
MSDS of Approved preparation used(Valid MSDS - within 4years for review date)
Pesticide Stock Register for the site
Pest Sighting Log
Record of Pest Infestation Observed in the last Quarter with Action taken & current status
Copy of Public Liability Insurance
PMS Log Sheets / Service Record
SELECT RESPONSE
Temporary Rodent Station Inspection Log
Service-wise Preparation Usage Log (Pesticide Usage Log)
SOP for Pesticide Storage
SOP for Disposal of Empty Pesticide Containers
SOP for Pesticide Spill Management
Chemical Inward Challans
Empty Container Outward Challans
Floor Map : Sensitive and Non Sensitive Areas
Customer have clear Demarcation map for Service-wise Pesticide use
Customer have Pest - Monitoring Device Map
Floor Plan - Rodent Station (Temporary Stations should also be marked as & when placed)
Exterior of the structure - Rodent Monitoring Devices are placed at intervals of 50 to 100 fts.
Interior Rodent Monitoring Devices are placed along the internal perimeter walls & in sensitive areas specific to the Rodent activity, all warehouses at intervals ofv20-40 ft.
Floor Plan - Insect Light Trap
Insect Light Trap Tubes are changed on base of Manufacturers's Recommendations & Document Maintained
Insect Light Trap control board count & changing record maintained
Floor Plan- Cockroach Traps (IMT / Exoroach)
Floor Plan - SIP Pheromone Traps
Annual Pest Risk Assessment & Quarterly Audit Reports
Trend Analysis of last Three months - 1) Rodent Trapped / Killed, 2) Insect Trappedin ILT - Flies, Hoppers, Moths, Crickets, 3) Lizards Trapped / Killed, 4) Cockroaches, 5) Store Insect Pest.
